title: Tomato and Basil Crostini
ingredients: ['8 plum tomatoes, diced', '15g fresh basil, chopped', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 loaf French bread, sliced and toasted']
